body:
Well, not as good as listening to music and playing sudoku while shitting, though.
You can try it at home if you want.
Still have to wait twenty seconds so I don't know what to do.
Two more.

Day 40 - 970*
Drinking a choco milk and eating so cookies while reviewing hentai. If they were good it would be the best thing of my life.
1/10.
